Label: senior6000-L1P01
例句: I need a pen and an eraser for my class.
翻譯: 我上課需要一支筆和一個橡皮擦。

Label: senior6000-L1P01
例句: Her ability to speak three languages is truly impressive.
翻譯: 她說三種語言的能力確實令人印象深刻。

Label: senior6000-L1P01
例句: I hope you will be able to join us for dinner tonight.
翻譯: 我希望你今晚能和我們一起吃晚餐。

Label: senior6000-L1P01
例句: What are you talking about? Tell me everything!
翻譯: 你在說什麼？全部告訴我！

Label: senior6000-L1P01
例句: Look at the stars shining brightly above us in the night sky.
翻譯: 看著夜空中在我們上方閃耀的星星。

Label: senior6000-L1P01
例句: Many young people dream of studying or working abroad after graduation.
翻譯: 許多年輕人夢想畢業後出國讀書或工作。

Label: senior6000-L1P01
例句: A small bridge runs across the river, connecting two villages.
翻譯: 一座小橋橫跨河流，連接兩個村莊。

Label: senior6000-L1P01
例句: That was a brave act to stand up for your friend.
翻譯: 那是為了你的朋友挺身而出的勇敢行為。

Label: senior6000-L1P01
例句: It's time for action, not just words; we need to start working.
翻譯: 現在是行動的時候了，而不僅僅是說說而已；我們需要開始工作。

Label: senior6000-L1P01
例句: The actress won an award for her outstanding performance in the movie.
翻譯: 那位女演員因其在電影中的出色表演而獲獎。

Label: senior6000-L1P01
例句: Please add some sugar to my coffee; it's a bit bitter.
翻譯: 請在我的咖啡裡加點糖；它有點苦。

Label: senior6000-L1P01
例句: Don't be afraid to ask questions if you don't understand.
翻譯: 如果你不懂，不要害怕提問。

Label: senior6000-L1P01
例句: We went for a walk after dinner to enjoy the cool evening air.
翻譯: 晚飯後我們去散步，享受涼爽的夜晚空氣。

Label: senior6000-L1P01
例句: Let's meet at the café this afternoon around 3 o'clock.
翻譯: 我們今天下午3點左右在咖啡廳見面吧。

Label: senior6000-L1P01
例句: Could you please say that again? I didn't quite catch it.
翻譯: 你能再說一次嗎？我沒完全聽清楚。

Label: senior6000-L1P01
例句: What is the legal voting age in your country?
翻譯: 在你的國家，合法的投票年齡是多少？

Label: senior6000-L1P01
例句: She moved to Taipei two years ago to pursue her studies.
翻譯: 她兩年前搬到台北攻讀學業。

Label: senior6000-L1P01
例句: I agree with you; it's a great idea for our project.
翻譯: 我同意你；這對我們的專案來說是個好主意。

Label: senior6000-L1P01
例句: The air quality in the city has improved greatly this year.
翻譯: 今年城市的空氣品質改善了很多。

Label: senior6000-L1P01
例句: My little brother loves watching airplanes take off and land at the airport.
翻譯: 我弟弟喜歡看飛機在機場起降。

Label: senior6000-L1P02
例句: We arrived at the airport three hours early for our international flight.
翻譯: 為了我們的國際航班，我們提早三小時抵達機場。

Label: senior6000-L1P02
例句: All the students passed the exam, so the teacher was very proud.
翻譯: 所有學生都通過了考試，所以老師非常驕傲。

Label: senior6000-L1P02
例句: My parents don't allow me to play video games late at night.
翻譯: 我的父母不允許我深夜玩電動。

Label: senior6000-L1P02
例句: I was so hungry, I almost ate two bowls of rice for dinner.
翻譯: 我太餓了，晚餐差點吃了兩碗飯。

Label: senior6000-L1P02
例句: We walked along the riverbank, enjoying the peaceful scenery.
翻譯: 我們沿著河岸散步，享受著寧靜的風景。

Label: senior6000-L1P02
例句: I don't need to do my homework; I've already finished it.
翻譯: 我不需要寫功課了；我已經寫完了。

Label: senior6000-L1P02
例句: My brother likes to play basketball, and I also enjoy playing it.
翻譯: 我哥哥喜歡打籃球，我也喜歡打。

Label: senior6000-L1P02
例句: Although it was raining, we still decided to go for a walk.
翻譯: 雖然下著雨，我們還是決定去散步。

Label: senior6000-L1P02
例句: My grandfather always tells interesting stories about his adventures.
翻譯: 我爺爺總是講他冒險的有趣故事。

Label: senior6000-L1P02
例句: I have to wake up at 6 am every weekday for school.
翻譯: 我每個平日都必須在早上六點起床上學。

Label: senior6000-L1P02
例句: We went to the library, and then we studied for our final exams.
翻譯: 我們去了圖書館，然後我們準備期末考。

Label: senior6000-L1P02
例句: My mom gets angry when I don't clean my room.
翻譯: 當我沒打掃房間時，我媽媽會生氣。

Label: senior6000-L1P02
例句: Pandas are cute animals that live in the mountains of China.
翻譯: 熊貓是住在中國山區的可愛動物。

Label: senior6000-L1P02
例句: Can I have another piece of cake, please? It's delicious!
翻譯: 我可以再吃一塊蛋糕嗎？它很好吃！

Label: senior6000-L1P02
例句: I knew the answer to the question on the test, so I felt confident.
翻譯: 我知道考題的答案，所以我很有自信。

Label: senior6000-L1P02
例句: An ant can carry food much heavier than itself.
翻譯: 螞蟻能搬運比自己重許多的食物。

Label: senior6000-L1P02
例句: Do you have any questions about the lecture? Feel free to ask.
翻譯: 關於這次演講，你有任何問題嗎？請隨時提問。

Label: senior6000-L1P02
例句: Did anybody see my phone? I can't find it anywhere.
翻譯: 有人看到我的手機嗎？我到處都找不到。

Label: senior6000-L1P02
例句: If you need anything, please let me know.
翻譯: 如果你需要任何東西，請讓我知道。

Label: senior6000-L1P02
例句: We live in a small apartment downtown, which is convenient for school.
翻譯: 我們住在一間市中心的小公寓，上學很方便。

Label: senior6000-L1P03
例句: The sun finally appeared after three days of rain.
翻譯: 連續下了三天雨之後，太陽終於出現了。

Label: senior6000-L1P03
例句: She bought a red apple for her lunch, preferring fruit over candy.
翻譯: 她買了一顆紅蘋果當午餐，比起糖果更偏好水果。

Label: senior6000-L1P03
例句: This area is famous for its delicious street food and night markets.
翻譯: 這個地區以其美味的街頭小吃和夜市聞名。

Label: senior6000-L1P03
例句: He broke his right arm playing basketball, so he can't write for now.
翻譯: 他打籃球時摔斷了右臂，所以現在不能寫字。

Label: senior6000-L1P03
例句: Students gathered around the teacher to ask questions about the exam.
翻譯: 學生們圍在老師周圍，詢問有關考試的問題。

Label: senior6000-L1P03
例句: We should arrive at the train station an hour before the departure time.
翻譯: 我們應該在發車時間前一小時抵達火車站。

Label: senior6000-L1P03
例句: Many famous works of art are displayed in the National Palace Museum.
翻譯: 許多著名的藝術品都在故宮博物院展出。

Label: senior6000-L1P03
例句: As she entered the room, everyone turned to look at her new hairstyle.
翻譯: 當她走進房間時，每個人都轉頭看她的新髮型。

Label: senior6000-L1P03
例句: Don't be afraid to ask your teacher questions if you don't understand the lesson.
翻譯: 如果你不懂課程，不要害怕問你的老師問題。

Label: senior6000-L1P03
例句: We usually meet at the library at 3 p.m. to study together.
翻譯: 我們通常下午三點在圖書館見面一起讀書。

Label: senior6000-L1P03
例句: The brave knight protected the village from the dragon's fiery attack.
翻譯: 勇敢的騎士保護村莊免受惡龍的火攻。

Label: senior6000-L1P03
中譯: (n.) 姨媽；姑媽；伯母；嬸嬸；舅媽
例句: My aunt bakes the best pineapple cake; everyone loves her recipe.
翻譯: 我的阿姨烤的鳳梨酥最棒；每個人都喜歡她的食譜。

Label: senior6000-L1P03
例句: Please put your phone away during class; it's distracting for everyone.
翻譯: 上課時請把手機收起來；它會讓每個人分心。

Label: senior6000-L1P03
例句: The baby smiled sweetly as his mother played peek-a-boo with him.
翻譯: 嬰兒對著媽媽玩躲貓貓的時候，甜甜地笑了。

Label: senior6000-L1P03
例句: I'll be back in an hour; please wait for me at the café.
翻譯: 我一小時後回來；請在咖啡廳等我。

Label: senior6000-L1P03
例句: Eating too much junk food is bad for your health and teeth.
翻譯: 吃太多垃圾食物對你的健康和牙齒不好。

Label: senior6000-L1P03
例句: She always carries a big bag filled with books to school every day.
翻譯: 她每天都背著一個裝滿書的大提包去上學。

Label: senior6000-L1P03
例句: My dog loves to chase the red ball in the park until he gets tired.
翻譯: 我的狗喜歡在公園裡追紅球，直到牠累了為止。

Label: senior6000-L1P03
例句: A banana is a healthy snack, full of potassium, perfect after exercise.
翻譯: 香蕉是一種健康的點心，富含鉀，運動後吃很完美。

Label: senior6000-L1P03
例句: The school band played a beautiful song at the assembly.
翻譯: 學校樂團在集會上演奏了一首優美的歌曲。

Label: senior6000-L1P04
例句: We need to go to the bank to deposit this money.
翻譯: 我們需要去銀行存這筆錢。

Label: senior6000-L1P04
例句: My brother loves to play baseball every weekend at the park.
翻譯: 我哥哥每個週末都喜歡在公園打棒球。

Label: senior6000-L1P04
例句: She put all the fresh fruit into a big basket.
翻譯: 她把所有新鮮水果放進一個大籃子裡。

Label: senior6000-L1P04
例句: Playing basketball is a great way to exercise and have fun.
翻譯: 打籃球是運動和玩樂的好方法。

Label: senior6000-L1P04
例句: He swung the baseball bat with all his strength and hit a home run.
翻譯: 他用盡全力揮舞棒球棒，擊出了一支全壘打。

例句: After a long day, a warm bath helps me relax completely.
翻譯: 漫長的一天之後，泡個熱水澡能讓我完全放鬆。

Label: senior6000-L1P04
例句: Excuse me, could you tell me where the bathroom is?
翻譯: 不好意思，請問洗手間在哪裡？

Label: senior6000-L1P04
例句: I want to be a doctor when I grow up.
翻譯: 我長大後想成為一名醫生。

Label: senior6000-L1P04
例句: We built sandcastles on the beach during our summer vacation.
翻譯: 暑假期間，我們在海灘上蓋沙堡。

Label: senior6000-L1P04
例句: My mom often adds green beans to her stir-fried vegetables.
翻譯: 我媽媽常在她的炒菜中加入四季豆。

Label: senior6000-L1P04
例句: I can't bear the thought of losing my dog.

Label: senior6000-L1P04
例句: The sunset over the ocean was absolutely beautiful.
翻譯: 海上的日落絕對美麗。

Label: senior6000-L1P04
例句: I studied hard because I wanted to pass the exam.
翻譯: 我努力學習因為我想通過考試。

Label: senior6000-L1P04
例句: After many years of practice, he became a skilled chef.
翻譯: 經過多年的練習，他成為一名熟練的廚師。

Label: senior6000-L1P04
例句: I like to read a book in bed before sleeping.
翻譯: 我喜歡睡覺前在床上看書。

Label: senior6000-L1P04
例句: My bedroom has a big window overlooking the garden.
翻譯: 我的臥室有一扇大窗戶，俯瞰著花園。

Label: senior6000-L1P04
例句: A bee flew into the room and landed on the window.
翻譯: 一隻蜜蜂飛進房間，落在窗戶上。

Label: senior6000-L1P04
例句: We had beef and vegetables for dinner tonight.
翻譯: 我們今晚晚餐吃了牛肉和蔬菜。

Label: senior6000-L1P04
例句: Please finish your homework before you watch TV.

Label: senior6000-L1P04
例句: The class will begin at 8:00 AM sharp tomorrow.
翻譯: 課程將於明天早上八點整準時開始。

Label: senior6000-L1P05
例句: The little puppy hid behind the big sofa.
翻譯: 小狗狗躲在大沙發後面。

Label: senior6000-L1P05
例句: I truly believe in your ability to succeed.
翻譯: 我真心相信你成功的能力。

Label: senior6000-L1P05
例句: The school bell rings to signal the end of class.
翻譯: 下課鈴響起，表示課程結束。

Label: senior6000-L1P05
例句: This book belongs to me; my name is written inside.
翻譯: 這本書是我的；我的名字寫在裡面。

Label: senior6000-L1P05
例句: Look at the fish swimming below the surface.
翻譯: 看那些在水面下游動的魚。

Label: senior6000-L1P05
例句: He fastened his seat belt before the car started.

Label: senior6000-L1P05
例句: We sat on the park bench to eat our sandwiches.

Label: senior6000-L1P05
例句: Please sit beside me so we can talk easily.

Label: senior6000-L1P05
例句: Always try your best; that's all that matters.
翻譯: 永遠盡力而為；那才是最重要的。

Label: senior6000-L1P05
例句: The library is between the post office and the bank.
翻譯: 圖書館在郵局和銀行之間。

Label: senior6000-L1P05
例句: He rode his bicycle to school every morning.
翻譯: 他每天早上騎自行車上學。

Label: senior6000-L1P05
例句: My dog is big, but he is very gentle.
翻譯: 我的狗很大隻，但牠非常溫馴。

Label: senior6000-L1P05
例句: A little bird sang sweetly on the tree branch.
翻譯: 一隻小鳥在樹枝上甜美地唱歌。

Label: senior6000-L1P05
例句: He took a big bite out of the juicy apple.
翻譯: 他從多汁的蘋果上咬了一大口。

Label: senior6000-L1P05
例句: She likes to wear black clothes for formal events.
翻譯: 她喜歡在正式場合穿黑色衣服。

Label: senior6000-L1P05
例句: The old man was blind, but he could hear everything.
翻譯: 老人是盲人，但他什麼都能聽到。

Label: senior6000-L1P05
例句: We live just three blocks from the school.
翻譯: 我們家離學校只有三個街區。

Label: senior6000-L1P05
例句: The wind began to blow strongly as the storm approached.
翻譯: 隨著暴風雨接近，風開始猛烈地吹。

Label: senior6000-L1P05
例句: The sky was a clear, beautiful blue this morning.
翻譯: 今天早上的天空是清澈美麗的藍色。

Label: senior6000-L1P05
例句: We took a small boat to cross the lake.
翻譯: 我們搭了一艘小船過湖。

Label: senior6000-L1P06
例句: Eating healthy food is good for your body.
翻譯: 吃健康的食物對你的身體有益。

Label: senior6000-L1P06
例句: I love to read adventure books in my free time.
翻譯: 我喜歡在閒暇時讀冒險故事書。

Label: senior6000-L1P06
中譯: (adj.) 感到厭煩的；覺得無聊的
例句: The students felt bored during the long, uninteresting lecture.
翻譯: 學生們在漫長又無趣的講座中感到很無聊。

Label: senior6000-L1P06
例句: That movie was so boring I almost fell asleep.
翻譯: 那部電影真是太無聊了，我差點睡著。

Label: senior6000-L1P06
例句: My grandmother was born in a small village by the sea.
翻譯: 我的奶奶出生在海邊的一個小村莊。

Label: senior6000-L1P06
例句: Can I borrow your pen for a moment? I left mine at home.
翻譯: 我可以借用你的筆一下嗎？我把我的忘在家裡了。

Label: senior6000-L1P06
例句: My boss is fair and always listens to our ideas.
翻譯: 我的老闆很公平，而且總是聽取我們的意見。

Label: senior6000-L1P06
例句: Both my parents are teachers, and they work at the same school.
翻譯: 我的父母都是老師，而且他們在同一所學校工作。

Label: senior6000-L1P06
例句: Please remember to put the empty plastic bottles in the recycling bin.
翻譯: 請記得把空的塑膠瓶丟進回收箱。

Label: senior6000-L1P06
例句: The key fell to the bottom of the deep well.
翻譯: 鑰匙掉到了深井的底部。

Label: senior6000-L1P06
例句: She tied a beautiful red bow in her daughter's hair.
翻譯: 她在女兒的頭髮上繫了一個漂亮的紅色蝴蝶結。

Label: senior6000-L1P06
例句: Please put the leftover rice in a clean bowl for later.
翻譯: 請把剩下的米飯裝進一個乾淨的碗裡，晚點吃。

Label: senior6000-L1P06
例句: He packed all his old toys into a large cardboard box.
翻譯: 他把所有舊玩具都裝進了一個大的紙箱裡。

Label: senior6000-L1P06
例句: The little boy was so excited to get a new toy car for his birthday.
翻譯: 這個小男孩很高興生日能得到一輛新玩具車。

Label: senior6000-L1P06
例句: It was very brave of her to stand up for her friend.
翻譯: 她為朋友挺身而出，非常勇敢。

Label: senior6000-L1P06
例句: I usually have toast and coffee for breakfast.
翻譯: 我早餐通常吃吐司和咖啡。

Label: senior6000-L1P06
例句: Let's take a short break after this task and grab some coffee.
翻譯: 我們在這項任務之後小憩一下，然後去喝杯咖啡吧。

Label: senior6000-L1P06
例句: My favorite breakfast is a big stack of pancakes with maple syrup.
翻譯: 我最喜歡的早餐是一大疊淋上楓糖漿的鬆餅。

Label: senior6000-L1P06
例句: We walked across the old stone bridge to get to the park.
翻譯: 我們走過那座古老的石橋到公園。

Label: senior6000-L1P06
例句: The sun is so bright today.
翻譯: 今天的太陽真亮。

Label: senior6000-L1P07
例句: Can you bring your book to class tomorrow?
翻譯: 你明天能把你的書帶來課堂嗎？

Label: senior6000-L1P07
例句: My younger brother is taller than me now.
翻譯: 我弟弟現在比我高。

Label: senior6000-L1P07
例句: That dog has beautiful brown eyes.
翻譯: 那隻狗有著美麗的棕色眼睛。

Label: senior6000-L1P07
例句: There's a tiny bug crawling on the window.
翻譯: 有隻小蟲子在窗戶上爬。

Label: senior6000-L1P07
例句: They plan to build a new library in our town.
翻譯: 他們計畫在我們鎮上建造一座新圖書館。

Label: senior6000-L1P07
例句: I take the bus to school every morning.
翻譯: 我每天早上搭公車上學。

Label: senior6000-L1P07
例句: My father travels a lot for business.
翻譯: 我爸爸為了生意經常出差。

Label: senior6000-L1P07
例句: I'm too busy to go out tonight.
翻譯: 我今晚太忙了，不能出去。

Label: senior6000-L1P07
例句: I wanted to go, but I was too tired.
翻譯: 我想去，但是我太累了。
